title: Hatter: Only the Best Are Mad...
description: It has been two years since Alice left Wonderland...Two years since she slayed the Jabberwockey. Two years since she broke the Hatter's heart. Now, he has given up hoping that his Other Half even exists. Determined to live his final days without love, he numbly lives in the world that he created. But, when a strange girl lands in his front yard, claiming to be the granddaughter of the girl that haunts his dreams at night, will he finally open up his heart to true love?
author: Rebecca   Davis
